name: IRREVERSIBLE
description:
Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of a unique psychological horror with shooter elements, unfolding in the expanse of an enthralling open world. A sinister village awaits you, shrouded in mysteries, populated by monsters, and filled with paranormal phenomena. In this grim place, you will meet its inhabitants, delve into their stories, and take part in saving them from the frightening fates that have befallen them.

Features



  • The game has a completely seamless open world, which is available immediately after a short introduction. To move around the world, you will have 3 types of transport at your disposal.
  • Immersive gameplay. There is no order in the game. You yourself have the right to choose where to go and what to do.
  • Quest system and storyline. By completing quests, solving puzzles and assigned tasks, you will get an interesting ending.
  • Well-developed dialogues. The game has 40 pages of AI-generated text dialogue. All this is also voiced by AI in English.
  • Good arsenal. To fight your enemies equally, you have 6 types of unique weapons at your disposal. However, you don’t have to use it; you can complete the game without firing a single shot.
  • Interesting locations. Abandoned villas, mental hospitals, churches, cemeteries and settlements await you.
  • Horror atmosphere. The game has an atmospheric soundtrack and also contains the main elements of the horror genre.
  • You are not alone. Characters with quests, interesting dialogues and most importantly - support are scattered throughout the open world.
